Text:
Dear TvTeam,

your torrents don't contain subtitles: The idx-file contains only the timecodes for the subtitles, which are compressed in the sub-file. Please offer the sub-files, too, otherwise the subtitles are useless. Thanks!

English subtitles (srt) can be found here:
http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/4151766/maskeblomstfamilien-en
